Name: Marmot Ajax 3
Tagline: Spacious and airy for weekend adventures.
ImageAlt: Marmot Ajax 3 tent pitched in a forest
Description: The Marmot Ajax 3 blends light weight with superior ventilation and a reliable three-person design.
Features: Pre-bent aluminum poles for more interior space

Name: The North Face Alpine Guide
ImageAlt: The North Face Alpine tent on snowy terrain
Description: Built to withstand strong winds and heavy snow, this four-season shelter is ready for your next summit push.
Features: Fully taped seams and snow flaps

Name: Kelty Trail Ridge 4
ImageAlt: Kelty Trail Ridge tent glowing at sunset
Description: Ideal for family getaways, it offers generous interior space with near-vertical walls and dual doors for easy access.
Features: Vertical walls for extra elbow room

Name: Black Diamond Eldorado

Description: An iconic single-wall tent engineered for climbers who need serious protection without the weight penalty.
